sub_topic.name: Characteristics of Life
sub_topic.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
sub_topic.sub_subject_name: Physical Sciences (Matter, Energy, and the Laws of the Created World)
sub_topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Characteristics of Life in Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular) (Science & Nature)

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Identify living things vs. non-living things.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Name eating, growing, and moving as things animals do.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that living things have babies (reproduce).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Observe a plant growing from a seed.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the basic needs of life (food, water, air, space).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Explain that all living things are made of cells.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Categorize organisms using MRS GREN (Movement, Respiration, Sensitivity, Growth, Reproduction, Excretion, Nutrition).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Explain why viruses are on the borderline of 'living'.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the distinction between biological life and spiritual life (Zoe vs. Bios).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Compare a rock (non-living) with a lichen (living).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the concept of Homeostasis (staying balanced).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the role of metabolism in sustaining life.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Connect response to stimuli to survival.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the 'Fine-Tuning' of biological constants necessary for life.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a definition of life that addresses biological complexity.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)
objectives.topic_name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize the interdependence of life's characteristics.
